original_title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 6: Weber, Brahms
overview: The historic Toscanini television concerts with the NBC Symphony Orchestra. Broadcast #6 was of a concert on November 3, 1951 from Carnegie Hall, featuring the Overture to Carl Maria von Weber's Euryanthe and Brahms's Symphony No. 1 in C minor op68. (Concerts #6 and #7 were released as "Vol. 4" in the DVD series.)
title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 6: Weber, Brahms
